tool_description: Get different metadata information for any airport worldwide. Search by IATA Code, ICAO Code, country or other criteria.
name: Airport Metadata
title: Airport Metadata

api_list.name: By Country
api_list.description: Get all airports with metadata by any country code (e.g. US, UK or NO).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airport-metadata.p.rapidapi.com/v1/airports/by-country/US"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airport-metadata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airport-metadata.p.rapidapi.com/v1/airports/by-country/{country_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airport-metadata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: By IATA Code
api_list.description: Query airport metadata by the IATA Code.

print(response.json())
